snippet: Danny Green and Tony Parker shot a combined 18 of 22 from the field as San Antonio won for the ninth time in 10 games and pushed its record to 17-4.
abstract: NBA Roundup; San Antonio Spurs beat Charlotte Bobcats, 132-102; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Danny Green and Tony Parker shot a combined 18 of 22 from the field as San Antonio won for the ninth time in 10 games and pushed its record to 17-4.

headline.seo: Spurs Foil Bobcats’ Plan By Hitting 19 3-Pointers
headline.main: Spurs Foil Bobcats’ Plan by Hitting 19 3-Pointers
headline.print_headline: Spurs Foil Bobcats’ Plan By Hitting 19 3-Pointers
